message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you a premium product that I believe you'll find highly valuable. I'm asking for $15000 for it. Please let me know if you're interested!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you reaching out. I'm interested, but $15000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to offer $12000 for it.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your interest. How about we meet halfway at $13500? I believe this will be a fair price for both of us. Let me know your thoughts!
